H0.text: Ore is a rock that contains important minerals.

H1.text: Carbonic is a rock that contains important minerals.

H2.text: Steel is a rock that contains important minerals.

H3.text: Copper is a rock that contains important minerals.

A4.text: Ore is natural rock or sediment that contains one or more valuable minerals, typically including metals, concentrated above background levels, and that is economically viable to mine and process.

A5.text: These are the leading source of copper ore.
